mapper.select: select * from orders where checkout_time between #{startDate} and #{endDate}
SELECT DAYOFWEEK(checkout_time) - 1 AS day, COUNT(*) AS count FROM orders WHERE business_id = #{businessId} AND YEARWEEK(checkout_time) = YEARWEEK(NOW()) GROUP BY day
SELECT DAYOFMONTH(checkout_time) AS day, COUNT(*) AS count FROM orders WHERE business_id = #{businessId} AND DATE_FORMAT(checkout_time, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m') GROUP BY day
